messages.title: STOP BREXIT
messages.content: Stop Brexit and invest the £50 billion Remain Bonus in public services and tackling inequality.

messages.title: TACKLE THE CLIMATE EMERGENCY
messages.content: Generate 80% of our electricity from renewables by 2030 and insulate all low-income homes by 2025.

messages.title: GIVE EVERY CHILD THE BEST START IN LIFE
messages.content: Recruit 20,000 more teachers as part of an extra £10 billion a year for schools.

messages.title: BUILD A FAIRER ECONOMY
messages.content: Provide free childcare from 9 months and give every adult £10,000 to spend on skills and training throughout their lives.

messages.title: TRANSFORM OUR MENTAL HEALTH SERVICES
messages.content: Treat mental health with the same urgency as physical health.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Invest the £50 billion Remain Bonus in public services and tackling inequality.
Generate 80% of electricity from renewables by 2030, insulate low-income homes by 2025.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Give Every Child The Best Start in Life
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Recruit 20,000 more teachers, extra £10 billion a year for schools.
Free childcare from 9 months, £10,000 for adults to spend on skills and training.
Treat mental health with the urgency of physical health.

issues.economy: £50 billion Remain Bonus, free childcare from 9 months, £10,000 to adults for training.
issues.education: 20,000 more teachers, £10 billion a year for schools.
issues.environment: 80% of electricity from renewables by 2030, insulate low-income homes by 2025.
issues.health: Treat mental health with the same urgency as physical health.

endorsements.endorsement: Liberal Democrats have the best plan to tackle the climate emergency.
Liberal Democrats will treat mental health with the same urgency as physical health.

endorsements.endorser: Gabriel Rozenberg, former Conservative councillor in Barnet
endorsements.endorsement: The Liberal Democrats are a pro-business party.
Britain is better off in the EU, and the Liberal Democrats can provide a home to those who believe in progressive change.

images.caption: JO SWINSON'S PLAN FOR BRITAIN'S FUTURE.

leaflet.additionalNotes: This leaflet provides insights into Jo Swinson and the Liberal Democrats' key policy areas for an election campaign, highlighting their stance on Brexit, climate change, education, the economy, and mental health services.
